types.html:
vergobreth m (plural vergobreths)

  1. (history) alternative form of vergobret[1]
    • 1882, Ernest Bosc, Histoire Nationale Des Gaulois sus Vercingétorix‎[2] (quotation in French; overall work in French), Paris, page 26:
      Le Vergobreth ou magistrat qui rend la justice
      (please add an English translation of this quotation)

title: vergobreth
